title: ISic001870. Inscribed fragment of a marble basin
body:
Facsimile Images

1[---]ΘΟΝΙ[---]

Apparatus criticus

Text after Orsi 1899

translation

commentary

The stone does not seem to have been seen or restudied since Orsi's 1899 publication (Pace simply reprints from Orsi).

bibliography

  • Orsi 1896 399 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001709
  • Orsi 1899 275 fig. 71 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002750
  • Pace 1927 160 no.4 and fig.64 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001692
